summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 7-day trial feature implementation. All backend APIs working correctly with trial users having is_premium=true, is_trial=true, and days_left=6. Frontend properly displays trial banners, premium access page, and upgrade flows. Trial users can access all premium features including unlimited AI tips and CSV export.
passed_tests: GET /api/auth/me returns trial fields (is_trial=true, days_left=6, is_premium=true)
Trial user can access CSV export (premium feature)
Trial user can generate unlimited AI tips (premium feature)
GET /api/premium/plans returns correct pricing (500 RSD monthly, 4200 RSD yearly)
Dashboard shows trial banner with 6 days countdown
Premium page shows 'Tvoj Trial je Aktivan!' message
Premium page shows 'Nadogradi na Premium Plan' button
Clicking upgrade button displays pricing plans
Trial status consistent across all endpoints
AI tip functionality works unlimited for trial users
